data.text: @Mark_J_Perry You post some really stupid s*t, but this is right up there. How about "I wore a mask because my mother is in her 90s." or "I asked my loved ones to get vaccinated because I do love them" or "I make medical decisions for my kids based on the recommendation of their doctors" or ..
@Mark_J_Perry I avoided restaurants that mandated masks. Does that count? If not...I got 0.
@Mark_J_Perry Good survey. I avoided movie theaters but they ended up closed. Otherwise my score is a 0.
@Mark_J_Perry This is interesting. However it is time dependent. My answers would be different now compared to April 2020 or even April 2021.
